PROFILE.LORE: I am a Full Stack developer with skills in various technologies. I stand out for being decisive, detail-oriented and capable of make informed decisions to find creative solutions. My focus on complex projects is supported by leadership, logical thinking and teamwork.

ABOUT_ME.TITLE: About me
ABOUT_ME.CHARACTER: I characterize myself as a self-taught person, always trying to learn new technologies and tools.
ABOUT_ME.NOW: I am currently looking for a job that I am passionate about, in a place that allows me to continue learning and grow personally.
ABOUT_ME.WORKS: Always willing to work as a team and continuously learn.

PROYECTS.TITLE: Proyects
PROYECTS.DESCRIPTION_BV: I developed an application for data management and digital processes of firefighters in Santa Catalina. The app allows role assignment, user registration, data publication, maintenance and transparency of the institution.
PROYECTS.DESCRIPTION_CAMPITO: Professional practice in the Campito Refugio ONG that needed to update its website and implement new functionalities.
PROYECTS.DESCRIPTION_TIENDA: This is a Web store, it has a database that can be modified by administrative users in a specific panel of theirs, and you can simulate a purchase of products with market-payment.
PROYECTS.DESCRIPTION_AUTOMARKET: I developed a system that manages vehicle inventories by zone, providing dealerships with a visual dashboard. It makes it easy for potential customers to view available vehicles, allowing efficient access and search to connect directly with the seller.
PROYECTS.DESCRIPTION_DOLAR: Application that shows the different dollar quotes at the current time. Tax and price calculator for the main streaming platforms.
PROYECTS.DESCRIPTION_RICK: Front End project, in which the Rick and Morty API is consumed, displaying and filtering the characters.
PROYECTS.DESCRIPTION_POMODORO: This is an app, which uses the popular Pomodoro productivity technique. With an intuitive and easy-to-use interface, this app helps you maintain focus and increase productivity by dividing your time into work and rest cycles.
PROYECTS.DESCRIPTION_BANKING: Develop an application, focused on managing a virtual wallet. The app offers users access to detailed information about their recent financial movements, current balances and provides advanced statistics for deeper financial analysis.
